description: Template object representing a reusable clump definition. Templates define clump geometry (pebble configuration) and inertial properties that can be instantiated multiple times efficiently. Obtained via itasca.clump.template.find(), itasca.clump.template.list(), or itasca.clump.template.make().
note: Objects of this type should not be created (instantiated) directly in Python. Use module functions that return instances. Templates are immutable once clumps reference them.

methods.name: id
methods.description: Get clump template ID number. Unique identifier for this template.

methods.name: valid
methods.description: Check if this object is a live clump template. Returns False if template has been deleted.

returns.description: True if template exists, False if deleted

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Delete this clump template. All clumps that referred to this clump template no longer refer to any clump template.

methods.name: name
methods.description: Get the clump template name. Names are unique identifiers for templates.

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Clone this clump template. The new clump template has name new_template_name and no clumps refer to the created clump template initially.

methods.name: pebbles
methods.description: Get the pebbles of this clump template as a tuple.

methods.name: add_pebble
methods.signature: template.add_pebble(pebble_radius: float, pebble_position: vec, pebble_id: int = None) -> TemplatePebble
methods.description: Add a pebble to clump template. This operation has no impact on the clump template inertial attributes. If optional argument ID not specified, ID is set to next available number.

methods.name: delete_pebble
methods.description: Delete a TemplatePebble from this template. This operation has no impact on template inertial attributes. Raises exception if any clumps refer to this template.

methods.name: orig_pos
methods.description: Get clump template original position as vector (x, y, z).

methods.name: orig_pos_x
methods.description: Get X-component of clump template original position.

methods.name: orig_pos_y
methods.description: Get Y-component of clump template original position.

methods.name: orig_pos_z
methods.description: Get Z-component of clump template original position.

methods.name: set_orig_pos
methods.description: Set clump template original position (vector).

methods.name: set_orig_pos_x
methods.description: Set X-component of clump template original position.

methods.name: set_orig_pos_y
methods.description: Set Y-component of clump template original position.

methods.name: set_orig_pos_z
methods.description: Set Z-component of clump template original position.

methods.name: moi
methods.description: Get clump template moment of inertia tensor. In 2D returns float (polar moment of inertia).

returns.description: Moment of inertia tensor (or float in 2D)

methods.name: set_moi
methods.description: Set clump template moment of inertia. In 2D use float (polar moment). When modified, no other attributes change (pebble sizes, volume, etc.). Sets MOI to fixed state - won't auto-update when scaling unless user changes fix state.

methods.name: moi_prin
methods.description: Get clump template principal moment of inertia as vector.

methods.name: moi_prin_x
methods.description: Get X-component of clump template principal moment of inertia.

methods.name: moi_prin_y
methods.description: Get Y-component of clump template principal moment of inertia.

methods.name: moi_prin_z
methods.description: Get Z-component of clump template principal moment of inertia.

methods.name: set_moi_prin
methods.description: Set clump template principal moment of inertia (vector).

methods.name: set_moi_prin_x
methods.description: Set X-component of clump template principal moment of inertia.

methods.name: set_moi_prin_y
methods.description: Set Y-component of clump template principal moment of inertia.

methods.name: set_moi_prin_z
methods.description: Set Z-component of clump template principal moment of inertia.

methods.name: vol
methods.description: Get clump template volume. In 2D this is volume per unit thickness.

methods.name: set_vol
methods.description: Set clump template volume. In 2D this is volume per unit thickness.
